perturbation.original_text: MediaNet Group Technologies shall pay Reseller a fee in accordance with the annexed Fee Schedule. MediaNet Group Technologies will remit payment as directed by Reseller in the time frames noted on the Compensation Schedule attached hereto.
perturbation.changed_text: MediaNet Group Technologies shall pay Reseller a fee. MediaNet Group Technologies will remit payment as directed by Reseller.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the references to 'Fee Schedule' and 'Compensation Schedule,' the method and timing of payment become undefined. This creates uncertainty because other sections still reference 'compensation', but without a clear schedule, enforcement is difficult.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate the Agreement on 60-days written notice during a renewed term. However, in no event shall termination of this Agreement by MediaNet Group Technologies relieve it of the obligation to remit payment to Reseller for sales or Portals, Hosting Services or other products and services to or through Buyers contracted by Reseller prior to such termination. The obligation to remit payment cease 30 days after termination of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate the Agreement on 60-days written notice during a renewed term. However, in no event shall termination of this Agreement by MediaNet Group Technologies relieve it of the obligation to remit payment to Reseller. The obligation to remit payment cease 30 days after termination of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific clause 'for sales or Portals, Hosting Services or other products and services to or through Buyers contracted by Reseller prior to such termination' makes the section ambiguous. It is uncertain for what transactions the reseller needs to be compensated after termination of the agreement and what actions are to be taken.

perturbation.original_text: Resellers are licensed to market the Brand-A-Port applications and receive commission on all product sales plus residual income on hosting/maintenance fees as outlined on the Compensation Schedule attached hereto.
perturbation.changed_text: Resellers are licensed to market the Brand-A-Port applications and receive commission on all product sales plus residual income on hosting/maintenance fees.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the explicit reference to 'Compensation Schedule attached hereto', the specific details for how commission and residual income are calculated are removed. This creates an issue because other sections still reference the idea of compensation, but no specifics are given anymore on how to compute them. This change will make it so that the contract is difficult to enforce as compensation is concerned.
